Establish a global unity government: As the ruler of the world, I would establish a global unity government that brings together all nations under a single, democratic administration. This would promote peace, cooperation, and mutual understanding among nations, as well as provide a platform for addressing global challenges such as climate change, poverty, and inequality.

Implement a universal basic income: To ensure that everyone has access to basic necessities, I would implement a universal basic income (UBI) that provides a guaranteed minimum income to every individual. This would help alleviate poverty, reduce inequality, and promote financial security for all.

Invest in space exploration and colonization: As the ruler of the world, I would prioritize space exploration and colonization to ensure the long-term survival of humanity. I would invest in advanced technologies that would enable us to explore and settle other planets, moons, and asteroids, providing a safety net for humanity in case of catastrophic events on Earth.

Develop advanced renewable energy sources: To combat climate change and ensure a sustainable future, I would invest heavily in research and development of advanced renewable energy sources such as fusion power, advanced solar panels, and wind turbines. This would help reduce our reliance on fossil fuels and transition to a clean energy economy.

Create a global education and cultural exchange program: To promote understanding and tolerance among different cultures, I would establish a global education and cultural exchange program that brings together students and professionals from around the world. This would facilitate the sharing of knowledge, ideas, and perspectives, promoting cross-cultural understanding and cooperation.
